00019 @define('AUTH_METHOD', 'digest');                       // can be digest, basic or none
00020 @define('AUTH_USER', 'admin');
00021 @define('AUTH_PASSWORD', 'changeme');
00022 @define('BASE_URL', '');                                        // auto-detected if empty (don't use BASE_URL in custom code but rather base_url() below)
00023 @define('CACHE_TIME', 60*60);                           // cache time in seconds (zero to disable)
00024 @define('CONTENT_DIR', 'content');                      // content directory, must be writable
00025 @define('DEFAULT_PAGE', 'start');

00027 @define('HOTGLUE_VERSION', '1.00.0');           // expected api.version.patchlevel

00037 @define('SNAPSHOT_MIN_AGE', 60*60);                     // auto- revisions are created every n seconds (zero to disable)
00038 @define('USE_HOTGLUE_ERRORS', true);            // use hotglue theming for error pages

00059 /**
00060  *      use this function to get the site's base url
00061  *
00062  *      @return string base url (not html-encoded)
00063  */
00064 function base_url()
00065 {
00066         global $base_url_cached;
00067 
00068         $temp = BASE_URL;
00069         if (!empty($temp)) {
00070                 return $temp;
00071         } elseif (!isset($base_url_cached)) {
00072                 if (empty($_SERVER['HTTPS'])) {
00073                         $base_url_cached = 'http://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
00074                         if ($_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'] != '80') {
00075                                 $base_url_cached .= $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
00076                         }
00077                 } else {
00078                         $base_url_cached = 'https://'.$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
00079                         if ($_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'] != '443') {
00080                                 $base_url_cached .= $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'];
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083                 $base_url_cached .= dirname($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']);
00084                 // make sure we have a trailing slash at the end
00085                 if (substr($base_url_cached, -1) != '/') {
00086                         $base_url_cached .= '/';
00087                 }
00088         }
00089 
00090         return $base_url_cached;
00091 }
